message: Not too sure if this is the right place for this but I am just looking to validate an idea before potentially building it. Is this something you would consider signing up for? A daily or weekly newsletter pulling information from many places (your calendar, to do list, news, local weather...). Any other thoughts? Thank you!

project idea: a shell that tells bash to go asleep when its past 1am
a shell that tells bash to go asleep when its past 1am

Project idea: a CLI for setting up a Next repo. Frameworks like Angular and Nuxt have official CLIs with options for CSS frameworks, linting configuration, state libraries, etc. that are opinionated but generally make for a quicker & more fun experience bootstrapping a project than with Next templates. Not sure why next doesn’t have this yet.
